patthana3.14:7.1: Saraṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.14:8.1: Araṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.14:9.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.14:10.1: Saraṇaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1

patthana3.14:169.1: Saraṇo uppanno dhammo saraṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.14:169.2: Saraṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.14:169.3: Saraṇo uppanno dhammo saraṇassa uppannassa ca araṇassa uppannassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana3.14:170.1: Araṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.14:171.1: Araṇo uppanno dhammo araṇassa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.14:172.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.14:176.1: Saraṇo paccuppanno dhammo saraṇassa paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.14:177.1: Araṇo paccuppanno dhammo araṇassa paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.14:178.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate satta.

patthana3.14:217.1: Saraṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.14:218.1: Araṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.14:219.1: Saraṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca araṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.14:220.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.14:221.1: Araṇo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa anidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana3.14:221.3: (Aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.14:222.1: Saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo saraṇassa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.14:222.3: Araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.14:223.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.14:227.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
